advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Take your game to the max
No data? No problem! Whether you’re hopping onto a plane or heading off the grid, disconnect with this great game.
Tons of fun on one screen

ios.subtitle: From Farming Town to Big City

editorialNotes.standard: This blockbuster runner keeps charging ahead with loads of rewards to chase and special events set in cities across the world.

ios.subtitle: FIFA Mobile is now FC Mobile!
Grow to Eat! Snake Battle Game
An Epic Build and Battle RPG

editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-travelling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp foes without spending any money or you buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

editorialNotes.tagline: Serve up a slice of fun

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: A fast and frantic battle royale
editorialNotes.standard: Survive the fierce battle for victory.
editorialNotes.short: Survive the fierce battle for victory.

editorialNotes.standard: We love chilling with friends in this classic card game’s standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.

ios.subtitle: Wreak Havoc as the Top Cat!

editorialNotes.tagline: Start a new life in the country
editorialNotes.standard: Running a farm is hard and often thankless work—unless that farm happens to be an adorable piece of virtual land overseen by a helpful, chatty scarecrow. Swiping across plots of land to harvest crops, feed livestock and manufacture goods is pleasantly relaxing, and growing your tiny farm into a booming business is a hugely satisfying achievement. Silly characters, cute critters and a variety of things to plant, reap, build and sell make Hay Day easy to pick up and tough to put down.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Fun Rhythm Song of Music Tiles

editorialNotes.standard: Smash monsters, wield awesome weapons and explore an unforgettable megacity in this cyberpunk adventure from the makers of Genshin Impact and Honkai: Star Rail.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It’s hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile – we still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

If you’ve ever dreamed of ruling your own fantasy world populated with scaly serpents and other mythical beasties, Dragon City is a treasure trove. It’s delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in Pokémon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If you’re a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.

ios.subtitle: How far can you roll the ball?

name: My Memory Shop-Global
artistName: Flying Eagle Network Technology Co., Ltd.

editorialNotes.standard: Dominate the lanes of this highly polished multiplayer online battle arena as a rocket-loving robot, a bunny-like mage or another unique hero from a list of dozens.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: Miniclip’s 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!
Classic puzzles for all difficulty levels and daily challenges with trophies.

name: Need for Speed No Limits Game

editorialNotes.standard: A glistening stretch of rain-soaked pavement lies before you. Will you drift, draft or smash your way to victory? Whatever your style, this iconic street racer delivers hugely fun arcade action. Impressive graphics make every Subaru, Porsche and McLaren a sight to behold, and a vast lineup of events gives you plenty of ways to show opponents your taillights. Individual races are enjoyably brief, and we got swept up in blazing through them to unlock the most exotic cars and discover the next challenges.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Fun with the talking pet cat!

editorialNotes.standard: This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivals’ property and rake in profits.
